Question.Subject: ebay Warranty Question?
Question.Content: I live in Canada, and I am thinking of buying an iPod Touch. I have found some good deals on ebay, and a lot of which come with warranty. However, someone said that if the product is coming from the United States, the warranty won't be valid in Canada. Is that true? I already have a good phne, Colin, but thanks for answering my question. So helpful. NOT!
Question.ChosenAnswer: Surely you would get a 100% correct answer, if you visited the Apple website and asked them

Answer.Content: Get an iphone. Its the same thing as the Touch, but you can also call/text people. You can get an iphone for 100$ with a two year contract. Cant beat that.
Answer.Reference: I got one about a year ago.

Answer.Content: Surely you would get a 100% correct answer, if you visited the Apple website and asked them
the warranty will be valid ! but be safe and go through paypal !!
